Episodes.Title: Try it Without the Porsche!
Episodes.Plot: After barely losing the Sandpiper, due to a dirty trick by Tina, Kris and Wildfire attract attention in the media and from a sports agent. Dani has a hard time coming to terms with the truth about her mother and Junior's departure. Meanwhile, Matt and Kris search for Junior.
Episodes.GuestStars: William Sterchi,  Nicholas Ballas,  Kristy Vaughan,  Scarlett McAlister

Episodes.Title: Opportunity Knocks
Episodes.Plot: Kerry comes to Kris with an opportunity to audition for a hot sauce commercial. She wants to pass, but decides not to when she realizes how much the money will help her and Raintree. When she has no chemistry with the actor she must kiss, the director grabs Junior to play the part, and the kiss reignites their relationship. Junior becomes partners with Pete on his new club, and begins to get acquainted with his mother Isabelle. Dani buys two horses to start her own stable against Davis, and Pete

Episodes.Title: A Good Convict Is Hard to Find
Episodes.Plot: Kris is put in an awkward position by a former inmate friend while she is helping out at a charity event at the prison. Matt and Junior decide to open their club without Pete, who is out of town. Meanwhile, Dani discovers that Isabelle lied to her.

Episodes.Title: Dangerous Liaisons
Episodes.Plot: Loyalties are tested , old feelings reignite, and the threat of loss becomes all too real when Kris faces her biggest challenge yet. Meanwhile, Pablo receives a call that will rock Raintree.

Episodes.Title: Family Matters
Episodes.Plot: Matt steps in to train Kris for a race while Pablo is out of town attending to personal matters, but all hell breaks lose on Raintree when Matt is suspected of breaking loyalties to help Dani train for the same race. With Charlie's help, Todd shows Jean that he can stand up for himself. Junior gets some unexpected help repairing damage to his club. Meanwhile, Isabelle shows her true motives.

Episodes.Title: Nothing Takes the Past Away Like the Future
Episodes.Plot: Pablo's past comes back to haunt him when someone comes to Raintree and tells him he has to train his horse; Meanwhile, Matt takes on a new job, which upsets Jean to no end. Isabelle stirs up more trouble, and does her best to prevent Ken and Junior from reconciling.

Episodes.Title: Taking Off
Episodes.Plot: Kris gets the chance of a lifetime, and soon finds that fame is taking over. She wonders if she's going to be able to keep her old friends, with all the forces pulling her away. Meanwhile, Rebecca gives Matt a helping hand.

Episodes.Title: Fear
Episodes.Plot: Kris is threatened by a someone from Pablo's past.

Episodes.Title: Break Down
Episodes.Plot: Kris has to ride for Dani Davis and is actually riding against Wildfire. Junior bets everything he has [the club] against Wildfire, with Bobby who claims he has turned over a new leaf. it turns out there is a major accident where both wildfire and dani's horse are hurt. Kris starts to beleive the accident is her fault.
Episodes.GuestStars: James Read, Kieren Hutchison, Jason London, Gary Stevens

Episodes.Plot: During a terrible storm Kris, Matt, Junior and Dani are trapped together and a torrent of secrets and lies are revealed. Ken pits Dani and Junior against each other just to save his skin. Kris takes a chance, but can she regain what she's already lost?

Episodes.Title: Who Are You
Episodes.Plot: Kris must try to convince an heiress to go give Wildfire a spot in the Breeder's Cup. However, Dani stoops to an all new low to ruin her chances. Tempers flare and a new romance begins to simmer.

Episodes.Title: For Love or Money
Episodes.Plot: Wildfire competes with Dani's horse Ishmael for a Breeders' Cup slot; Kerry rekindles his romance with Gillian.
Episodes.Writer: Loren Segan, Stephanie Ripps, Christina Lynch

Episodes.Title: Close Shave
Episodes.Plot: Kris must decide between staying at Raintree or traveling to Europe to further her career; Baby Wildfire must be sold.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kieren Hutchison, Jason London, Charlotte Salt, Amy Jo Johnson
